label.name: Spreadsheet software tends to focus on individual ...
label.intro:
Spreadsheet software tends to focus on individual cells, which can result in errors such as when reformatting the data - for example, when rearranging a particular column, or when trying to rearrange data through “copy and paste”. Any level of “copy and paste” is dangerous as it opens the doors to errors.


Statistical packages prioritise the analysis of columns, which preserves the associations between variables. This facilitates accurate and reliable analysis, and allows for the easy rearrangement of data.
